name: Final Fight
description:
Jessica, daughter of Metro City
mayor and former wrestler Mike
Haggar, has been kidnapped. Haggar
teams up with Jessica’s boyfriend
Cody Travers, one of the toughest
guys in town, to get her back!

In this Super NES™ version of the
acclaimed arcade classic, take to the
streets as either Haggar or Cody and
fight your way deep into the territory
of the Mad Gear Gang, and bring back
Jessica.

This is the US version of the game.
